ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Proposal to change how bard haste songs stack with   enchanter/sham an haste spells
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 55, I still get players who are surprised to see that a Bard can sing more than one song at a time. Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk
ygData.messageBody:
At level 55, I still get players who are surprised to see that a Bard can sing more than one song at a
time.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 55 songs, Innoruuk



Jeffrey Sue wrote:

> also, there is a difference between ''perceived'' power and ''actual'' power. there is a lot of player
> ignorance on what a bard can actually do. that doesn't necessarily mean the actual power needs to be
> pumped, just the perception. at level 55 i still run across people who say ''oh i didn't know a bard
> could do that''.
